overview: My father is a sea captain. All his life has been away from home, fishing and sailing the world’s major fishing grounds. For me, my father has always been one who shares a couple of months a year with us, but when he goes, I never know what is his really life.  In Secret images I travel to Argentina to find out for my first time, what is the lifestyle of a captain and a father who have always been absent.
title: Imágenes secretas
